APT Groups.name: APT29
APT Groups.description: APT29 is a threat group attributed to the Russian government known for targeting various sectors.

techniques.name: Application Layer Protocol
techniques.description: Use of common application layer protocols to communicate with a command and control server.

techniques.name: Phishing
techniques.description: Spearphishing campaign using tailored messages to gain access to targeted systems.

APT Groups.name: APT41
APT Groups.description: APT41 is a Chinese cyber espionage group that also conducts financially motivated operations.

techniques.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
techniques.description: Use of command-line interpreters to execute arbitrary commands.

techniques.name: Ingress Tool Transfer
techniques.description: Transferring tools or payloads from an external system to a target environment.
